name: AKHIL LAL P.P
label: Signal Processing & Computer Vision Engineer
summary: Signal Processing master's graduate specializing in Computer Vision and Deep Learning. Experienced in medical image segmentation, Python, and PyTorch. Passionate about solving real-world problems using AI.

work_experience.summary: Assisted in conducting laboratory sessions and mentoring undergraduate students in signal processing courses
highlights: Guided students in implementing signal processing algorithms using MATLAB
Supported lab evaluations and troubleshooting of signal processing experiments

projects.title: Retinal Layer Segmentation using SD-OCT Images with Deep Learning
projects.summary: Developed a lightweight deep learning framework for accurate retinal layer segmentation from OCT scans, balancing segmentation accuracy with computational efficiency.
highlights: Designed and trained a deep learning model for multi-class retinal layer segmentation
Worked with medical OCT image datasets and handled class imbalance challenges
Evaluated performance using Dice score and other segmentation metrics
